episodes.title: Why Leaving a Narcissistic Relationship Feels Like Leaving a Cult
episodes.description:
What makes it so hard to walk away from someone who’s clearly hurting you?

In this episode, Dr. Mazzella explains how narcissistic relationships mirror cult dynamics and scams—offering an illusion of salvation, bliss, and togetherness. Leaving means giving up not only the fantasy, but also confronting painful realities and internalized propaganda.

The grief isn't just about the partner—it’s about the loss of the promise that things would finally get better.

✅  About The Narcissism Decoder: 

Welcome to the Narcissism Decoder, where we dive into the intriguing world of narcissism! While my podcast provides an in-depth exploration of various aspects of narcissistic dynamics, I have something extra special for you on YouTube.

Unlike my podcast, these videos are short, snappy, and designed for the fast-paced world. I may not go as deep as my podcast episodes, but I make up for it with a more dynamic and visually appealing approach. It's the perfect solution for those who want to grasp the essence of narcissistic dynamics without committing to a longer podcast episode.

Join me on this journey as we decode narcissism together. Subscribe now, and let's unravel the fascinating world of narcissism in a way that suits your preference - concise, captivating, and always insightful.
